_sText:
Thanks to everyone who gave me feedback from the beta and thanks to the servers who hosted this map. Because of this I was able to make improvements.

zm_playtime
------------------
Features:

- 64 spawns

- Lots of places to barricade in

- Good variety of hold spots

- Moving / interactive pieces

- Lego textures

- Optimized for high frame rates

- Plenty of secrets ;)

- 3D skybox

### Change log: what I changed from the beta:

- Balanced some spots

- Added more spots

- Added new secrets

- Added a cannon, which can launch players (humans, be careful!)

- Added teleports inside every moving platform to prevent players from glitching inside

- Optimized a little more

- Reduced filesize from 20.9 MB to 15.9 MB

ENJOY!
==================
